articles.author: Ellen Knickmeyer, Matthew Lee
articles.title: Rubio says South Africa's ambassador to the US 'is no longer welcome' in the country - The Associated Press
articles.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio says South Africa’s ambassador to the United States “is no longer welcome” in the United States. Rubio accused Emrahim Rasool of being a “race-baiting politician” and declared him “persona non grata.” He announced the decision i…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Friday that South Africas ambassador to the United States is no longer welcome in the country, in the latest Trump administration move targeting th… [+3264 chars]
